Emergency Call Handling is the critical interface for the citizen into the command center, public safety workflow. Motorola Solution's is the leading software developer and solution provider for Emergency Call Handling, the software that enables 911 call centers to receive and process calls in Public Safety Answering Points across North America. The Emergency Call Handling solution team is one business sleeve of the Motorola Solutions Software Enterprise where innovation of workflow enhancements are being developed for call handling, incident management, responder dispatching and situational awareness. This software developer position will be a member of the team working on software applications for Public Safety Job Description About the Role We are seeking a motivated and tech-savvy Technical Support Analyst Intern to join our IT team.
